title: John Wayne Gacy
Died: May 10, 1994 (1994-05-10)  (aged 52)  Stateville Correctional Center, Crest Hill, Illinois, U.S.
Conviction(s): 1 count of sodomy  33 counts of murder  1 count of sexual assault  1 count of indecent liberties with a child    (March 12, 1980)
Criminal penalty: Death (12 counts; March 13, 1980) Life imprisonment (21 consecutive counts)
